column4: please you guys hg clone -r 8209 http://linuxtv.org/hg/v4l-dvb gives me "No module named mercurial" why???
i dont get anything about whats written there... it just should work..
not if youo dont have the module
do you see the module listed?
you need to find what gives that module (or how to compile it)

i see.. sudo apt-get install build-essential gcc make mercurial linux-headers-`uname -r` should do that... but it gives me E: Could not get lock /var/lib/dpkg/lock - open (11 Resource temporarily unavailable)
ok synaptic was open.. now i get another err: Errors were encountered while processing:
